summary: We recently published 11 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer radar. Salesforce, Inc. headline: Informatica Named a Leader in 2026 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data & Analytics Governance Platforms
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., January 09, 2026--Informatica from Salesforce, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management, today announced it has been named a Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data and Analytics Governance Platforms.
